content: hat size s/m-m/l to fit head circumference 50-52 cm materials drops alaska from garnstudio yarn group c 150-150 g colour no 5 charcoal grey drops crochet hook size 5 mm crochet gauge 12 double_crochet x 12 row = 10 x 10 cm this pattern is written in british english all measurements in charts are in cm *there are different terms for crocheting in british and american english *
